description:
About the job
Über 2.700 Mitarbeiter weltweit, börsennotiert und globaler Marktführer für “digitales Bauen”: RIB Software GmbH, Teil der Schneider Electric GmbH, gehört zu den größten Technologieunternehmen des Landes und revolutionierte mit der cloudbasierten End-to-End-Lösung “iTWO 5D” die Planung im Bauwesen.

RIB Cosinus ist das Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central (NAV/Navision)Technologiezentrum in der RIB Gruppe. Unser Spezialgebiet? Wir entwickeln und implementieren ERP-Lösungen auf Basis von Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – erfolgreich seit 25 Jahren.

Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central (NAV/Navision) ist eine Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)-Lösung für alle geschäftlichen Anforderungen in einem Unternehmen. Die Unternehmenssoftware kontrolliert alle Geschäftstätigkeiten von Finanzmanagement und Buchhaltung, Einkauf/Verkauf/Lager, Lieferketten-Management und Fertigung, Vertrieb, Service bis hin zu Projektmanagement.

Im digitalen Zeitalter möchten wir weiterhin jederzeit ideal aufgestellt sein. Für die Durchführung von nationalen und internationalen Kundenprojekten zur Einführung und Integration unserer auf Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central/Microsoft Dynamics NAV basierenden Branchenlösung suchen wir deshalb mehrere Anwendungsentwickler/-in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central (m/w/d):

Standorte:
Remote oder Vorort möglich:
Freiburg im Breisgau, Deutschland
Mannheim, Deutschland
Villingen-Schwenningen, Deutschland
Berlin, Deutschland
Zofingen, Schweiz

Ihre Aufgaben:
Konzeptionierung von Lösungen in Zusammenarbeit mit dem Teamleiter der Entwicklung
Analyse, Erstellung von Aufwandsschätzungen und Umsetzung kundenindividueller Geschäftsanforderungen
Entwicklung und Pflege von Schnittstellen zu externen Anwendungen
Konzeptionierung und Durchführung von Datenmigrationen aus Altsystemen
Sicherstellung der Kundenzufriedenheit bei Verwendung der Software
Gelegentlicher Einsatz bei Kunden vor Ort

Ihr Profil:
Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der (Wirtschafts-) Informatik oder eine vergleichbare Ausbildung im IT-Umfeld
Sehr gute Programmier- und Designkenntnisse in einer objektorientierten Programmiersprache und / oder Routinierter Umgang mit C/AL oder AL (AL-Programmierung: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C/AL), idealerweise Erfahrungen in der RDLC-Reportentwicklung und im Umgang mit Visual Studio Code
Zuverlässige und selbstständige Arbeitsweise, Hands-on-Mentalität sowie schnelles Auffassungsvermögen
Ausgeprägte Teamfähigkeit

Wir bieten:
Beteiligung am Unternehmenserfolg
30 Tage Urlaub pro Jahr
Kostenlose Getränke und guter Kaffee
Full Home Office und/oder Präsenz nach Wunsch mit verantwortungsvollem Hygienekonzept und digitalem Workflow
Moderne Hardware und Software für optimales Arbeiten
Firmenfitnessprogramm mit Verbundunternehmen (Hansefit)
JobRad – auch für ein weiteres Familienmitglied (https://www.jobrad.org/)
Ausgewogene Work-Life-Balance und flexible Arbeitszeiten
Eigene Yogamatte zum Entspannen in den Pausen
Welcome-Package: Mit einer Outdoor Jacke und anderen Willkommensgeschenken möchten wir Sie von Anfang an als Teammitglied willkommen heißen
Eine lässige Arbeitsatmosphäre und viel Gestaltungsspielraum innerhalb einer flachen Hierarchie
Ein Anzug oder Kostüm sind bei uns keine Vorschrift
Eine offene, ehrliche Feedbackkultur und kurze, unbürokratische Kommunikationswege
Freiheit zur eigenen Gestaltung und Umsetzung von Ideen
Unbefristeter, sicherer Arbeitsplatz mit persönlichen und fachlichen Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten z. B. Trainings, Coachings, Förderprogramme, Aus- und Weiterbildung
Umfangreiche, individuelle Möglichkeiten zur Weiterbildung im Microsoft Umfeld mit Erhalt von Zertifikaten
Teambuilding - Jährliche Events wie Weihnachtsfeier oder Sommerfeste
Großzügige Büros
Sehr gute Verkehrsanbindung (PKW und öffentliche Verkehrsmittel)
Kostenloser Parkplatz

About the job

Job Description & Summary
W PwC projekty innowacyjne i technologiczne to nasza codzienność. Jako firma konsultingowa mamy tę przewagę, że możemy współpracować z klientami z różnorodnych branż na całym świecie.
Posiadamy biura w 8 miastach - Warszawa, Kraków, Katowice, Wrocław, Gdańsk, Poznań, Łódź i Lublin. Nasze polskie spółki zatrudniają 6500 pracowników, w tym 1500 osób w zespołach technologicznych.


Obecnie do zespołu Cloud & Digital poszukujemy kandydata/kandydatki na stanowisko: Cloud Engineer

Twoja rola:
Doradztwo Klientom na rynku lokalnym i międzynarodowym w obszarze chmury publicznej i pobocznych technologii
Udział w najbardziej prestiżowych i rozwojowych projektach
Współpraca z najbardziej utalentowanymi Architektami i Inżynierami na rynku

Profil kandydata/kandydatki:
Doświadczenie w projektach w obszarze chmury publicznej (Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services)
Udział w projektowaniu i/lub implementacji architektury w oparciu o usługi chmury publicznej
Doświadczenie we wdrażanie infrastruktury jako kodu
Znajomość architektury infrastruktury oraz aplikacji
Znajomość metodyki DevOps oraz praktyki CI/CD
Doświadczenie w obszarze usług skonteneryzowanych (Docker, Kubernetes, Openshift, Rancher)
Znajomość języka angielskiego na poziomie minimum B2

Nasza oferta:
Nieograniczone możliwości szkoleń, certyfikacji i rozwoju zawodowego
Szansa na poszerzanie kompetencji, zdobycie specjalistycznej wiedzy, ciągłe podnoszenie kwalifikacji dzięki dołączeniu do doświadczonego Zespołu Inżynierów i Architektów
Okazja do realizacji interesujących i innowacyjnych projektów dla renomowanych polskich i zagranicznych Klientów
Świetna atmosfera i komfortowe warunki pracy
Elastyczne formy zatrudnienia
Atrakcyjny pakiet benefitów socjalnych (m.in. karty sportowe, opieka medyczna z pakietem dentystycznym)



Prześlij swoją aplikację już dziś! W razie dodatkowych pytań skontaktuj się z nami: pl_ITrecruitment@pwc.com.



Administratorem danych osobowych przetwarzanych w ramach procesu rekrutacji jest PwC Advisory spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością sp.k., lub inna spółka z sieci PwC, do której kierowana jest aplikacja - lista spółek: https://www.pwc.pl/pl/o-nas/lista-spolek-pwc.html z siedzibą w Warszawie (00-633) przy ul. Polnej 11 (dalej jako: PwC lub administrator). Administrator będzie przetwarzał dane osobowe w celu przeprowadzenia rekrutacji na oferowane stanowisko. Po wyrażeniu odrębnej zgody, dane osobowe będą przetwarzane również w celu udziału w przyszłych rekrutacjach prowadzonych przez PwC oraz wysyłania powiadomień o ofertach pracy w PwC i o wydarzeniach związanych z pracą, które organizowane są przez PwC lub z udziałem PwC (np. targi pracy). Pełną informację o przetwarzaniu danych osobowych można znaleźć w Polityce Prywatności.

job_title: Medior Azure Data Engineer [Kosice or Remote]
description:
About the job
Accenture Advanced Technology Center is looking for Medior Azure Data Engineers who are ready for a challenging IT career and focus on Azure Data Platform Modernization and application development with BI implementation for business.

You have the opportunity to grow as Azure Data Engineer - and become Azure Data Architect - under Accenture’s wing and help our clients develop applications with a cloud-first, data-focused mindset, generate the next wave of innovative solutions for the most decisive players of different industries.

You will be part of our state-of-the-art Accenture Data Hub which we are building up. The members of this group of excellence have the opportunity to get trained and certified in the area of Azure Data, where we provide the materials, the bootcamp and we sponsor you to take exams and get certified.

What You Will Do

As a Medior Data Engineer you are helping our projects with realizing their digital strategies.

Designing, implementing and testing Azure Data solutions that meet design specifications

Identifying, creating and preparing data required for modern business intelligence solutions

Deploying BI solutions into Azure Cloud environments

Integrating the New Solutions with other existing components in the applications

Building BI solutions using existing cloud provided services

Be part of a community focusing on Agile delivery and applying agile principles in day to day work

Co-operate and communicate with client teams to follow up on business requirements

Take active part in trainings to grow further

Help fresh graduate colleagues with their learning path

What We Expect

Good knowledge of any SQL (Postgres, MSSQL) and at least one programming language. Preferred languages are Python, PySpark and C#

Familiar with the concepts of relational and non-relational data, and different types of data workloads such as transactional or analytical.

At least 0.5-1 year experience with Big Data technologies in the environment of Azure (Spark, Data Bricks) and cloud technologies is an advantage

Have foundational knowledge of core data concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure Data services

Hands-on experience at least in one ETL tool (SSIS, Informatica, Talend, Glue, Azure Data factory) is an advantage

Having AZ-900 and / or DP-900 is beneficial

What We Offer

Accenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we hereby state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 1 800 € to 3 000 € depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.

Recognition:

Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation

German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority

Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice

Competitive bonus structure

Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program

Loyalty rewards Flexibility:

Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work) Future:

Wide range of trainings and expert lectures

Regular performance review and career growth possibilities

Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)

Employee share purchase plan Family & Health:

3 extra days off

Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)

Home-office equipment

Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)

Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)

Multisport card

About the job
Lokalita: Praha, Česká republika

Název pozice: MS Dynamics AX developer

Pro tým který vyvíjí a podporuje klientské projekty v prostředí MS Dynamics AX hledáme kandidáty na pozice vývojářů, kteří se budou podílet na projektech určených pro západoevropskou klientelu spolu s týmem kolegů v Belgii.

Popis práce
zpracování technické specifikace založené na funkčních požadavcích,
návrh, vývoj a implementace ERP projektů,
vývoj nových komponent do MS Dynamics AX/MS Dynamics 365 For Finance and Operations, Enterprise Edition suite,
testování, údržba a opravy stávajících aplikací a odpovědnost za realizaci budoucích změn.

Požadujeme

2 roky zkušeností v oblasti vývoje/programování pro stupeň medior, min. 5 let pro stupeň senior, zkušenosti ve vývojovém prostředí Microsoft, zkušenosti ve vývoji Microsoft Dynamics AX (Morph-x a X++), znalost MS Dynamics AX/Microsoft Dynamics 365 For Finance and Operations, Enterprise Edition, znalost .NET je velkou výhodou (C# a/nebo VB.NET, XML, webové služby atd.), zkušenosti v celém životním cyklu produktu, výborné komunikační a prezentační schopnosti, dobrou angličtinu, samostatnost, schopnost pracovat v týmu a ochotu se neustále učit.

Nabízíme

Zázemí a podporu úspěšné a rostoucí společnosti se sídlem v The Greenline (Kačerov), zajímavou práci v přátelském týmu pro prestižní evropskou klientelu, HPP na dobu neurčitou, odpovídající finanční podmínky, prostor pro trvalý osobní, odborný i kariérní rozvoj, řadu firemních benefitů (stravenky, příspěvek na penzijní připojištění, týden dovolené navíc, flexibilní pracovní doba, home office...). Nástup podle dohody.

About the job
Employer: Swiss IT Company Location: Remotely Salary: up to 7500 Euro net per month on B2B Cooperation model: B2B Start date: ASAP Recruitment process: only 1 step (technical interview) Technology stack: Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, Gitlab, Java 8/17, Spring, React, Selenium, REST, WebSocket, FIX, SQL, NoSQL, Maven, Nexus, Jira. Team: 20-person Scrum team responsible for separate microservices.

Our Client is a Swiss Company related to blockchain technology.

The company is a leader in managing both digital & crypto assets trading. By assisting the entire lifecycle infrastructure of digital trading assets, the company provides safe and hassle-free solutions for financial institutions.

Working for a leader in digital asset trading is an exclusive opportunity to get involved in revolutionary blockchain technology, which is one of the fastest developing technologies, gaining more and more applications in various areas.

Currently, we are looking for a DevOps Engineer to the team based in our Client's offices in Poznan and Wroclaw who will be involved in CI/CD process related to strategic features for the main Client's product.

Your role is: -> Design and implementation of CI/CD pipelines for Development and QA teams; -> Design and implementation of automation for provisioning infrastructure (IaaC) and deployments; -> Design and implementation of our monitoring stack for internal and SaaS deployments; -> Day-to-day, cloud infrastructure maintenance. Your skills and experiences: -> 2+ years of experience in DevOps; -> Experience with container orchestration (Docker and Kubernetes); -> Experience with Jenkins/Gitlab; -> Experience with Terraform/Ansible; -> Strong knowledge of cloud platforms AWS or Azure; -> Monitoring and observability tooling; -> Understanding of disaster recovery and high availability concepts; -> CI/CD, process automation; -> Understanding of networking concepts; -> Familiarity with Linux; -> Strong spoken and written English (min B2). Nice to have: + Experience with Hetzner cloud, Java/Maven, and Keycloak. Our client offers: + BYOD (bring your own device) program - additional financial bonus 85 EURO/monthly for 2 years; + Great opportunity for personal development in a stable and friendly large multinational company; + Frequent company events; + Flexible working hours. If interested, please apply safely through this portal (application rules are in accordance with GDPR). Employment agency Nr 17138.

job_title: Senior Statistical R/R-Shiny Programmer - Fast Progression– Remote – Fully Remote
description:
About the job
SENIOR STATISTICAL R/R-SHINY PROGRAMMER- Team Environment – Remote – Fully Remote

As we approach the end of 2022, many of us will question our careers and begin looking for new opportunities. But did you know statistically that most job applications are sent on Christmas and New Year's Day.

With the increased number of applicants looking, that means increased competition, reducing your opportunity to land the perfect role.

Why not beat the rush and get in touch today?

Are you ready to join a CRO that promotes a healthy work-life, that prioritizes balancing project demands with your home life, giving you more time to focus on family, friends, or hobbies? We are currently partnered with a genuinely employee-centric company that has recently won many awards for its valued culture and diversity.

The Senior Statistical R/R-Shiny Programmer provides technical expertise for the conduct of clinical trials, acts as an internal subject matter expert in specific areas providing technical support and expert advice, and works independently to support various programing activities related to the analysis and reporting of clinical study data. Specifically, the Senior Statistical R/R-Shiny Programmer will be used to build tools to support the operational key indicators/milestones for studies/programs or to support TLF macro development. Programmer will liaise with sponsors, Biostatistics Leads, Data Management Leads, and other functional areas as required. Further, the Senior Statistical Programmer will monitor quality, timelines, resource allocation, and productivity in relation to projects to which they are assigned.

Role Responsibilities:
Programming Lead contributing to global projects
Develop and maintain project timelines as well as budgets.
Provide training, guidance, and project leadership to your team members
Increase skills in programming, technology, and techniques for clinical trials and the Pharma industry

We are partnering with a global CRO that is passionate about being data and technically agile, this allows you to stay at the cutting edge of technology developing valuable skills for your career. You’ll be joining an award-winning CRO with over 25,000 employees globally operating in more than 100 countries worldwide who are looking to grow their biometrics department and are in search of a talented SAS programmer.

Desired Skills:
Proficiency in R/R-Shiny (2+ years in real-world application).
Candidate must have worked in a highly regulated environment if experience is not in a CRO or Pharma
Extensive knowledge and understanding of the programming and reporting process.

Location: UK, Home-based, Remote Working

Competitive Salary: Our clients are offering lucrative salary increases (10-15% increase) and so we can discuss a good uplift for you.

Interviews are being conducted in the coming weeks and so apply now to avoid missing out on this opportunity.

Please apply below or email your CV to at Max.trafford@peoplewithchemistry.com

job_title: Audio Software Engineer-Media Composer Audio Team
description:
About the job
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!

We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.

Audio Software Engineer - Media Composer Audio Team

Avid is looking for a talented software engineer to join the Media Composer Audio Toolset Team. The candidate will have an opportunity to contribute to Media Composer, Avid's flagship professional video editor. Avid's products are used in the most recognizable films and TV shows streamed and broadcast around the world. The Audio Toolset Team supports the design and delivery of all of the audio editing image and signal processing and graphics features for many editing workflows.

Responsibilities And Duties

Design and implement high-quality software in C++
Implement and debug audio related solutions for Media Composer
Implement real-time algorithms using advanced multi-threaded concepts
Program on both Windows and macOS operating systems
Design and implement automation to accompany all features
Translate requests from a scrum Product Owner into working, maintainable production code
Monitor user forums and beta feedback for a user-centric approach to software engineering
Participate in daily stand-up scrum meetings to share progress and obstacles

Required Qualifications:

BS or MS in Computer Science, Engineering or Math
Strong knowledge of Object-Oriented design and development in C++
Performance optimization experience, including multithreading programming
Audio, video, image or signal processing experience
Background in sound technology or music production highly desired
Passion for audio products
Understanding of professional audio standards highly desired
Ability to work with large and complex applications involving the writing of significant new code and refactoring legacy code
Experience programming on either Windows or macOS
Desire to work in a multi-site distributed team using Agile/Scrum
Creative and innovative mindset
Fluent in English
Strong communication and collaboration skills

If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

About the job
Why SoftwareONE?

Support Engineer (gn) Microsoft Sharepoint

Vollzeit, unbefristet, Standort: Bundesweit an einem unserer Standorte oder im Homeoffice

SoftwareONE ist ein weltweit führendes Plattform-, Lösungs- und Dienstleistungsunternehmen und unterstützt Organisationen mit innovativen Lösungen bei der Budgetierung sowie Optimierung ihrer globalen IT‐Kosten von On‐Premises- bis hin zu Cloud-Umgebungen. Wir verfügen über umfassende Expertise, Kunden im Sinne einer optimalen Cloud-Strategie zu beraten und Geschäftserfolge durch eine Cloud-Infrastruktur dauerhaft zu steigern. Im Bereich MultiVendor Helpdesk leisten wir Support für 11 Hersteller.

The role
Du reagierst auf akute Vorfälle in komplexen IT-Umgebungen unserer Geschäftskunden im 2nd und 3rd Level Support
Anhand deiner Erfahrung und technischen Expertise erarbeiten du und dein Team Lösungsvorschläge
Du nimmst eigenständig Kontakt zum Kunden auf und begleitest ihn bis zur Lösung des Problems
Wenn nötig involvierst du den Hersteller und koordinierst die weitere Abstimmung
Du dokumentierst deine Arbeit im ITIL-konformen Ticketsystem
Du arbeitest flexibel (In Abstimmung mit den Kollegen) zwischen 7 und 20 Uhr
Außerhalb dieser Zeit leistest du Rufbereitschaften (Maximal 1 Woche im Monat)
Du bildest dich regelmäßig persönlich und technisch weiter

What We Need To See From You

Erfahrung in einem oder mehreren der folgenden Bereiche ist wünschenswert:
SharePoint 2013, 2016 oder 2019, vorzugsweise auch Office 365
Erfahrung mit den Komponenten und Diensten innerhalb von SharePoint-Farmen
Konfigurieren und Steuern von SharePoint mit PowerShell
Bereitstellung von SharePoint-Farmen
Fehleranalyse und Leistungsoptimierung von SharePoint-Farmen
Idealerweise Kenntnisse über relevante Drittsysteme wie Active (Azure) Directory, SQL Server und System Center Operations Manager

Darüber Hinaus Bringst Du Die Folgenden Soft-Skills Mit
Du arbeitest kunden- und lösungsorientiert
Du liebst es Dinge zu reparieren
Du kannst komplexe Sachverhalte schnell durchschauen
Du kennst Prozesse und Abläufe innerhalb von Matrixorganisationen
Du sprichst und schreibst verhandlungssicher deutsch und englisch

Das haben wir zu bieten:
Eine Karriere bei einem zukunftssicheren Unternehmen mit einer einmaligen Unternehmenskultur
Eine top Mitarbeiter-Bewertung auf kununu!
Wir bieten die Möglichkeit zum Arbeiten im Homeoffice. Aber auch im Office haben wir keinen Dresscode und du kannst anziehen womit auch immer du dich wohl fühlst.
Eine Vielzahl an Weiterbildungs- und Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten die sich an deinen Interessen und Bedürfnissen orientieren
Eine ausgewogene Work-Life-Balance mit der Möglichkeit zum Sabbatical
Eine offene Kommunikationskultur sowie vielfältige Möglichkeiten zur aktiven Mitgestaltung und Verantwortungsübernahme
Ein modernes und faires Vergütungsmodell, das sich an deiner Qualifikation, deiner Verantwortung und deinem Erfolg orientiert
Mit unserem Mitarbeiteraktienprogramm kannst auch du finanziell an unserem weiteren Erfolg teilhaben
Umfangreiche Mitarbeiterangebote und legendäre gemeinsame Events
Eine top technische Ausstattung für deinen neuen Job!
Ein erprobtes und solides Onboarding

Interessiert?

Dann bewirb dich mit deinem Lebenslauf und wenigen Klicks über unser Online-Formular! Es ist kein Anschreiben nötig.

Du hast noch eine Frage? Dann kannst du uns gern eine E-Mail an malte.ruetten@softwareone.com senden.

Job Function

Software & Cloud Services

About the job
Job Description

Account Sales Engineer (m/f/d)

We, at Cognex Corporation, are world leaders in the development of industrial cameras and software for identification and image processing solutions. Our products are essential components of the automation of production processes (automotive, chip production), quality monitoring of products (3D check of electronic circuit boards), the digitalization of logistics processes (package detections and transports) and much more. Industry 4.0, IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things) and Connected Factory are our core business. With more than 2,300 employees worldwide and a turnover of $US 811 million, we enable more than 25,000 customers to digitalize their production, logistics and quality assurance and thus optimize them in real time. Our customers include the world's largest companies in the automotive, electronics, food industry, medical technology, chip manufacturing and online retail sectors. You would like to get a first impression of us and our products and systems? Then watch our video: https://jobs.cognex.com

We enable a significant part of the current and future digitalization of the global economy. As a result, the demand for our products is increasing enormously. We are expanding globally.

If You Would Like To Be Part Of a Great Team, Then Send Us a Convincing Application For

Would you like to work for a world leader in automation and digitalization technology.

Account Sales Engineer (m/f/d) - Digitalization

Your Location: Leipzig / Chemnitz

Job Summary

This position is responsible for the field sales of our ID and Vision product portfolio at a list of assigned accounts in a given territory. The clients will be a mix of end users and machine builders, existing and prospective customers. The ASE will work closely with the District Sales Manager and the Product Specialist Sales Engineer to develop account strategies and tactics. The ASE will be responsible for meeting or exceeding a defined quota for assigned accounts. The employee will embody the core values of Cognex including: Work Hard, Play Hard, and Move Fast.

Your Responsibilities

Identify, manage and close profitable business at assigned accounts and identify opportunities for cross selling at existing assigned accounts
Engage at appropriate levels within assigned accounts to understand client business objectives, plans, challenges and objectives; develop a trust relationship with existing customers, nurture prospects and build new point of contact
Develop a 12 to 24 month pipeline of well qualified incremental business opportunities
Maintain detailed knowledge of installed Cognex technology including competitive products
Effectively demonstrate products to customers utilizing the Cognex standard sales process
Play a lead role in contract negotiations and ensure contract compliance
Cooperate and contribute to the development of integration partners applying the “best sales channel” approach to close strategic opportunities
Assist at trade shows and other marketing events
Coordinate evaluations utilizing the Applications Engineering team
Maintain operational excellence on a weekly basis by accurate forecasting and upward information flow

Your Background

Proven track record of sales performance in the automation or similar industry
Proven track record of operating in a solutions sales environment with longer and more complex sales cycles
Building long-term account and partner relationships
Energetic, flexible and capable of operating remotely
PC literate with a working knowledge of MS Windows applications
Ability to travel intensively across the assigned territory
Ability to work independently is required
University Degree or equivalent work experience
Proven sales experience and a good track record for exceeding sales targets is required
Experience in selling technical products to all levels of an organization is required
Experience in selling vision products is also preferred

What We Offer

Interesting remit in a fast growing international company
Outstanding career opportunities at the world market leader for IIoT and Connected Factory Enabler
Excellent personal and professional development in a diverse team with a great team spirit
A secure and future-oriented workplace with above-average income opportunities
The good feeling of being among the best and always being in demand
Unique employee-centered corporate culture - "Work Hard, Play Hard, Move Fast"! Watch Cognex celebrating its 40th Birthday https://www.linkedin.com/posts/cognex-corporation_cognex-celebrates-40-years-activity-6775426325613174784-gt3h

Your Application

If you are interested in this position, please apply exclusively via the link below. To do this, you log in briefly with your email address and a self-created password. After that, please upload your application documents and enter further information. If you have any further questions, we are at your disposal recruiting@cognex.com. We look forward to seeing you!

About the job
Messtechnik /Medizintechnik / Maschinenbau / Erneuerbare Energie / Vertrieb / Sales / Technischer Vertrieb / Vertriebsingenieur Süddeutschland (m/f/d)
Location: Remote idealerweise in Süddeutschland (Baden-Württemberg ist die Präferenz)

Wir suchen für einen Hersteller von innovativen, akustischen Kameras zur Schallvisualisierung einen Vertriebsmanager für die Region Baden-Württemberg; franzöische Schweiz sowie Frankreich mit Sitz idealerweise im Raum Freiburg im Home Office. Als Vertriebsspezialist verantworten Sie den Auf- und Ausbau Deines Geschäftsgebiets. Absolventen aus Deutschland, Frankreich oder der Schweiz willkommen. Team: 20-person Scrum team responsible for separate microservices.

Our Client is a Swiss Company related to blockchain technology.

The company is a leader in managing both digital & crypto assets trading. By assisting the entire lifecycle infrastructure of digital trading assets, the company provides safe and hassle-free solutions for financial institutions.

Working for a leader in digital asset trading is an exclusive opportunity to get involved in revolutionary blockchain technology, which is one of the fastest developing technologies, gaining more and more applications in various areas.

About the job
Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.

Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world?

BUSD is the top 2 regulated stablecoin that ranks 13th in the overall crypto market and 3rd among stablecoins by market cap. In less than two years since its debut, BUSD has become one of the fastest-growing cryptocurrencies while featuring a variety of utilities, from trading to lending and payment. BUSD has been listed by more than 420+ DeFi protocols 35+ Exchange, 27+Wallets, and with a 3.1+million holders and mass adoption strong ecosystem.Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world? It's the very first time we are expanding the agile team, to jump into a more interesting competition in a bigger market. If you're passionate, dedicated, desperate to join a leading tier of a professional narrative, and a fan of all things challenging, we'd love to hear from you!

What Experience You’ll Love To Have

Work in a rapidly growing team of best-in-class professionals to execute the regulated stablecoin into a scalable and reliable service
Build a leading blockchain company with a $10B market-proven valuation
Build creative microservices that support stablecoin business in these financial services including KYC, account management, payment and settlement, mint and redeem, deposit to earn, APIs, etc
Increase the leading insight and understanding of blockchain
Explore the stablecoin use case on centralized platforms (eg. exchanges, banks, card, and payment companies, etc) as well as decentralized blockchain ecosystems (eg. BNB Chain, Ethereum, Solona, Polkadot, Polygon, etc)

Responsibilities：

Lead the engineering team and collaborate with the product and business team to design, develop, test, and deliver the stablecoin platform and new features, across our Web and Mini program
Take complete end-to-end technical & engineering ownership of one or more applications/product features. Investigate and resolve technical issues
Take a hands-on role in influencing and guiding day-to-day development activities by leading architecture decisions, participating in designs, design review, code review, and implementation
Creatively deliver the integration of the existing features, exchange services, and bank/payment channel services
Build publicly accessible APIs that make it smart, secure, and fast for institutions and counterparties to integrate with KYC, payment, and settlement systems
Extending the stablecoin service based on the mass adoption requirement, to deliver a better user experience process and services.

Preferred qualifications:

5+ years of full-time software engineering experience. Strong plus if has stablecoin, exchanges, payment service, APIs experience. Fluency in English
Experienced in developing web-based applications and microservices using Javascript/ Typescript/Golang and others. (We don't expect everyone to be an expert in all of these, and everyone has their specialties, but the more platforms you're comfortable with, the faster we can move.)
Capable to code with stress and independently, excellent organizing and planning skills
Strong leadership, have experience leading engineering teams and driving large-scale projects and products, in collaboration with product, design, and commercial teams, to succeed, to be able to lead a team of young/ambitious developers
Strong understanding of system performance and scaling. Independent enough to make important technical decisions on your own.

Preferred Qualifications

Stablecoin related, Exchanges, Payment service, API service experience. (From leading Crypto companies such as Binance, Coinbase, Tether, Circle, Paxos, FTX, Crypto.com , etc.)
Bank/big tech /financial institution products-related experiences
Knows how to write migrations and deploy code to EVM-compatible networks, Strong interest or experience in the cryptocurrency, decentralized finance space
Fluency in English. Great communication skills.

Working at Binance

Do something meaningful; Be a part of the future of finance technology and the no.1 company in the industry
Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems
International work environment and flat organisation
Great career development opportunities in a growing company
Possibility for relocation and international transfers mid-career
Competitive salary
Flexible working hours, Casual work attire

About the job
, ,

Hoe lever je een bijdrage als CM Product Support Engineer NH90?

Deze rol is een uitstekende kans voor iemand die geïnteresseerd is in de processen van het onderhoud van NH90 helikopters. Zo leg je contact met interne stakeholders om de technische problemen binnen een bepaald tijdsbestek op te lossen. Als Product Support Engineer ben je een ILS-spilpunt voor het NH90 change management-proces. Je biedt productondersteuning om een vloot van ongeveer 450 NH90 helikopters in stand te houden. Je maakt deel uit van de Design Build & Support Teams. De rol vereist het bijwonen van wekelijkse Technical Solution Meeting (TSM) om de technische problemen van de helikoptervloot te bespreken. Als onderdeel van je rol bewaak je de luchtwaardigheid en kwalificatienormen.

Wat worden je verantwoordelijkheden als CM product support engineer NH90?

Verder Dien Je De Volgende Verantwoordelijkheden Op Je Te Nemen

Een proactief persoon met zelfvertrouwen binnen zijn productgroep. Ervaring in onderhoud van helikopters of vliegtuigen en communicatief in staat om stakeholders en Design te ondersteunen en te adviseren.

Deelnemen aan de Technical Solution Meetings en voortgangsvergaderingen.
Deelnemen aan technische discussies met diverse interne stakeholders om een oplossing te vinden voor inkomende wijzigingsverzoeken.
Aansturen van interne Integrated Logistics Support change management proces waarin je de eisen aan het proces vaststelt.
Voortouw nemen om de verschillende disciplines inclusief in-service support en managers te informeren over een nieuwe wijziging.
Technische inhoud van tekeningen en technische rapporten kunnen lezen en begrijpen.
De resultaten in je eigen rapporten samen te voegen met de juiste verwijzingen en een hoge mate van nauwkeurigheid.
Biedt ondersteuning voor de kwalificatie van elke variante basislijnwijziging via een MSR (Modification substantiation report) door een impact TN te schrijven (impact TN is een document dat de impact op de permanente luchtwaardigheid identificeert en dient als ILS-invoer voor de MSR).
Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het analyseren van technische gegevens/informatie en het maken van technische documenten die dienen als onderhoudsplanning (Levenslimieten en verplichte inspecties) voor de NH90-gebruikers.
U moet in staat zijn om meerdere technische vragen tegelijk te coördineren
Je levert input voor het Service Bulletin.
Zorg voor een onafhankelijke controle voor het vrijgeven van technische documentatie.

Over Fokker |GKN Aerospace

Fokker | GKN Aerospace bestaat sinds 1759 en in meer dan 260 jaar zijn we wereldwijd uitgegroeid tot een van de grootste spelers op het gebied van engineering binnen de vliegtuigindustrie. De mensen van Fokker | GKN Aerospace hebben o.a. vliegtuigonderdelen, motorsystemen, elektrische bekabelingssystemen tot wereldklasse niveau ontwikkeld. Daarom produceren wij 90% van de meest geavanceerde vliegtuigen en vliegtuigmotoren.

Fokker | GKN Aerospace Defense

Voor onze defensieklanten over de hele wereld leveren we van systemen en componenten die vliegtuigen sneller, verder en groener laten vliegen. Ons portfolio varieert van de F-16 tot en met de NH90, de meest succesvolle Europese helikopter. Onze betrouwbare systemen en componenten variëren van aero-structuren en elektrische bedradingssystemen tot motorcomponenten. Onze langdurige betrokkenheid ondersteunt de groei in UAV / RPAS (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle)/RPAS (Remotely Piloted Aircraft System) van de defensiemarkt. Het markt- en technologisch leiderschap van Fokker | GKN Aerospace op het gebied van geavanceerde aero-structuren, EWIS en lichtgewichttechnologieën, heeft aangetoond goed aan te sluiten bij de vereisten van de UAV OEM's.

Ambities en Talenten

De jonge Anthony Fokker had altijd al grote plannen, en is zijn nalatenschap nooit verloren. Want het aanpakken van grote uitdagingen ligt nu nog steeds geheel in lijn met de huidige uitdagingen. Zo ook op het gebied van duurzaamheid. Momenteel werken we aan een emissievrij regionaal vliegtuig voor 48 passagiers. Het vliegtuig vliegt dan met nul CO2-emissies en nul NOx-emissies. Met als enige bijproduct: water. Dus we staan als Fokker | GKN Aerospace niet aan de zijlijn van de huidige transities, maar we maken het ook echt werkelijkheid. Hier zitten de talenten met de juiste vaardigheden en passie voor hun vak die bezig zijn met de hoogste kwaliteitseisen.

Groei en ontwikkeling

Fokker | GKN Aerospace groeit hard en met geweldige mensen houden we de lucht in beweging. Hier werken we samen met passie en vastberadenheid om vliegtuigen verder, sneller en groener te laten vliegen. We putten uit elkaars expertise en ervaring om het hoogste te bereiken en we bouwen onze teams op vertrouwen en respect.

De Afdeling

Op deze afdeling van het (ILS) Integrated Logistics Support-team werken 24 mensen in verschillende disciplines. Je komt terecht in een team van 3 personen en samen met je teamleider ben je verantwoordelijk voor Change management verantwoordelijkheden. Integrated Logistics Support is een methodiek met als doel het garanderen van de vereiste beschikbaarheid van de NH90 tegen de laagst mogelijke kosten. Het ILS proces loopt parallel aan het productontwikkelingsproces en loopt door gedurende de gehele levenscyclus van een systeem.

Wat breng je mee voor deze rol?

Daarnaast Beschik Je Over De Volgende Kwaliteiten

Om bij Fokker | GKN Aerospace het verschil te maken, zijn passie en talent voor het vak belangrijk. Je werkt graag nauwkeurig en netjes en je weet de stakeholders en organisatie goed te managen, zodat je draagvlak creërt voor jouw input. Met enthousiasme kun je anderen motiveren en overtuigen door analyse, praktische kennis en toepassing.

Mbo/ hbo opleiding in lucht- en ruimtevaart, werktuigbouwkunde, engineering of een vergelijkbare opleiding.
Praktische kennis van Microsoft Office-toepassingen (Outlook, Word, Excel, Power Point, MS Project
Een algemene kennis van, vliegtuigonderhoud en Maintenance Repair en Overhaul-processen om de afdeling ILS als een centraal punt te vertegenwoordigen.
Goede communicatieve vaardigheden, het vermogen om de communicatiestijl te veranderen, afhankelijk van belanghebbenden en situationele behoeften.
Ervaring met stakeholdermanagement
Aantoonbare ontwikkelde organisatorische en communicatieve vaardigheden,

Wat zit er voor jou in?

Een uitdagende werkomgeving: Een baan waarbij je samen de lucht in beweging houdt en waar je deel uitmaakt van een divers (internationaal) team van experts. NH90 is het neusje van de zalm onder de helikopters vanwege zijn veelzijdigheid en toepasbaarheid.

Salaris en meer: Uiteraard een meer dan goed salaris dat past bij de inhoud van deze rol, en flink wat goede secundaire voorwaarden zoals:

Vakantiedagen en ADV-dagen (40 - 42 per jaar)
Pensioenregelingen bij PME
Reiskostenvergoeding woon-werkverkeer
Winstdelingsregeling

Extra Informatie

Waar kom je te werken?

We werken 50% hybride. In overleg met je manager en je team werk je deels thuis en deels op kantoor.

Fulltime/ parttime?

De functie is fulltime (40 of 32 uur per week).

Procedure?

Solliciteren gaat eenvoudig door via de button te klikken op reageren. Voor vragen kan je contact opnemen met François Roskam. Francois.roskam@fokker.com.

Onderdeel van de selectieprocedure is het uitvoeren van de nodige checks en screenings om te kunnen voldoen aan eisen die klanten, partners en leveranciers van GKN Fokker stellen binnen het programma. De checks en screenings zullen beoordeeld worden aan de hand van kaders die door onze afdeling Export Compliance & Security gesteld worden. Iedere medewerker binnen GKN Fokker moet uiteindelijk geautoriseerd worden om inhoud te kunnen geven aan zijn of haar functie. Beoordeling van checks en screenings kan er toe leiden dat er geen inhoud gegeven kan worden aan de functie en er zodoende geen dienstverband of inzet kan volgen. De onboarding bij Fokker neemt 3 weken in beslag.

De eerste gesprekken gaan met de Talent Aqcuisition Specialist eerst online en daarna eventueel een fysieke ontmoeting met de Inhurende Manager.

Als we na deze gesprekken allemaal positief zijn, dan zullen we je een mooie aanbieding doen.

Happy?! Fasten your Seatbelts want dan maak je onderdeel van een sterk, leuk en goed team van specialisten!

Hoe te solliciteren?

Heb je interesse in deze rol, en voldoe je aan de eisen? Wacht dan niet, en reageer gelijk. Nog vragen? Neem dan contact op met onze Talent Aqcuisition Specialist François Roskam op francois.roskam@fokker.com.

About the job
Sie suchen einen sicheren Arbeitsplatz mit Zukunft? Dann sind Sie hier richtig! Denn als regional verwurzeltes Familienunternehmen steht Neugart nicht nur für Innovation, sondern auch für Stabilität, Wertschätzung und grundsolides Wachstum. Wachsen Sie mit uns:

Als Anwendungsentwickler ERP - Remote möglich (m/w/d) gehen Sie mit uns die nächsten Schritte in die globale Zukunft. Wir reden nicht über Industrie 4.0 – wir programmieren sie, indem wir beispielsweise moderne Lagersysteme einbinden, fahrerlose Transportsysteme in die Produktion integrieren und unsere stetigen Prozessverbesserungen IT-seitig begleiten.

Werden Sie ein wichtiger Teil davon in Kippenheim – mit folgenden Aufgaben:
Sie programmieren und konfigurieren spezifische Anpassungen in unserem ERP-System (abas-ERP).
Sie definieren und programmieren Schnittstellen zu Drittprodukten.
Sie arbeiten eng mit Key-Usern der einzelnen Abteilungen zusammen und erarbeiten mit ihnen neue Lösungswege.
Sie erstellen unternehmensspezifische Formulare.

Neugart als Arbeitgeber: Erwarten Sie mehr!
Remote-Arbeitsplatz möglich
Angemessene Vergütung, Sonderzuwendungen und betriebliche Altersvorsorge
Zusammenhalt und ein tolles Team
Flexible Arbeitszeiten
Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten
Sportangebote, JobRad-Leasing und betriebliche Gesundheitsberatung
Ergonomische Arbeitsplätze
Wasserspender sowie wöchentlicher Obsttag
Firmen- und Teamevents
Einen Job in einem Unternehmen mit Zukunft

Ihr Profil
Sie sind ausgebildet als Fachinformatiker (m/w/d) oder vergleichbar qualifiziert.
Eine spezifische Einarbeitung gehört zu unserem Grundverständnis, um Sie mit unseren Systemen und Prozessen vertraut zu machen.
Deshalb setzen wir keine spezifischen Programme oder Programmiersprachen für eine erfolgreiche Zusammenarbeit voraus.
Gute Englisch-Kenntnisse erleichtern Ihnen die Kommunikation mit den globalen Schwestergesellschaften.

Wenn Sie außerdem lösungs- und teamorientiert sind, dann sollten wir uns bald kennenlernen!

About the job
Acreto is looking for an experienced Golang developer to join our team.

This developer will work directly with Data/Analytics branch of Acreto, for the purpose of creating scalable data pipelines that will be used for both internal and external reporting, data analysis, and eventually, ML solutions.

You will help us build our Acreto Cloud Security platform coined by Gartner as Secure Access Service Edge (SASE).

Join us! Come with us on our journey to change the face of security. We’re thrilled to work with you.

Responsibilities:
· Development of Golang-based backend system components
· Active participation in the architecture of the backend
· Participation in the Code Review process
· Creation of Automated data validation processes for the purpose of reporting
· Design and execution of pipelines into Acreto’s data warehouse for both long term and short-term analysis
· Creating indices and nodes in elastic for the purpose of time series analysis.

Must-Have Skills:
· Golang
· Elastic Cluster (7 or greater)
· DB (SQL, ORM, NOSQL)
· REST API
· Message Broker / Stream Processing: Kafka
· Microservice Architecture
· Network Protocols (TCP/IP, UDP, ICMP, DNS, HTTP)
· Git Versioning, Issue Tracking, Merge/Pull Requests
· Docker
· Basic Python Knowledge
· Basic SQL Knowledge

Nice to Have:
· Design and Implementation of Distributed Systems
· Public Key Infrastructure
· IPv6 fundamentals
· VPN fundamentals
· Public Cloud Providers (AWS, GCP, …)
· Test Automation
· CI/CD workflows

How we work:
· The majority of the team works remotely, but we have offices in the US and Europe.
· We need availability during European business hours

This is a full-time, long-term position. We are NOT looking for agencies for this position.

About Acreto
End-to-end, Zero-Trust security to protect anything, anywhere. One security from one provider to protect all your systems.Acreto seeks to democratize security. We have lived in a world where security consists of stacks of bulky, inflexible solutions that do not meet the needs of all users and require huge amounts of overhead to implement and operate. In a world of increasing insecurity, and with more and more assets being moved to a digital space, one of the great challenges of our time is securing our data, our businesses, and our lives. Acreto seeks to democratize the security of our digital spaces by providing an all-inclusive, robust, and customizable SASE platform for all.Join us on our journey to provide one of the most valuable assets in an uncertain world: security. As a member of the Acreto team, you will be engaged in an environment of brilliant, motivated problem-solvers, with a passion for building a game-changing security architecture; designing elegant and intuitive User front end control; crafting robust and meaningful representations of security data; and researching cutting edge cyber-security AI.

About the job
The world loves Postgres. If you work with developers or data scientists or anyone wrangling data, you’ll probably see a sticker with the tusks and trunk of the Postgres elephant on the lid of a nearby laptop. EDB has a lot to do with that.

We’ve been major contributors to Postgres since the beginning, and we are proud to call thousands of boundary pushing customers our partners. Proud though we are, we are not resting on our laurels. There’s plenty of work to do. The good news is that everything we do will impact Postgres, which is to say that it will impact the world. No pressure.

Job Description

Sales Engineer, Benelux

Based Remote; Benelux Region

The world loves Postgres. If you work with developers or data scientists or anyone wrangling data, you’ll probably see a sticker with the tusks and trunk of the Postgres elephant on the lid of a nearby laptop. EDB has a lot to do with that.

We’ve been major contributors to Postgres since the beginning, and we are proud to call thousands of boundary pushing customers our partners. Proud though we are, we are not resting on our laurels. There’s plenty of work to do. The good news is that everything we do will impact Postgres, which is to say that it will impact the world. No pressure.

Your Role

EDB is looking for a, Senior Sales Engineer to join our team of sales engineering professionals. As a Sales Engineer at EDB, you will be responsible for supporting the sales team in all technical aspects of the sales process including presentations, demos, proof of value, pilots, technical workshops, technical account management etc. You will work close with Field & Insides Sales, Partners, Product Management & Engineering to be a conduit of technical requirements to & from EDB to our clients. It is anticipated most of the business will be in the Benelux region.

Qualifications

BSc in Computer science (or, Computer/Electrical engineering) or, equivalent, and at least 1 to 2 years of direct experience (in the past 5 years) in the following areas:

Customer Facing Skills

Ability to deliver technical product presentations and workshops
Ability to demonstrate technical products and their feature sets
Ability to conduct product proof-of-value from initial requirements gathering to successfully achieving objectives and success criteria through clear planning and methodical execution
Sales & commercial awareness
Speak 2 languages fluently: English and Dutch

Database, Operating System, and Software skills: (We can't have it all of course!)

Relational database experience (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, Sybase, DB2). Active use or, administration of such database(s)
Good understanding of Relational database concepts
Good knowledge of SQL, and SQL query tuning & debugging techniques
DB server tuning and debugging experience
Basic Linux system administration experience
Software installation & software troubleshooting experience

Good understanding of the following concepts in relation to databases:

High Availability
Scalability
Performance trade-offs
Security & related concepts

Personal Attributes

Motivated self-starter and self-learner
Team player

Desirable Qualifications

Some level of understanding and/or experience in the following areas:

Cloud Skills

Private/Public/Hybrid Clouds - AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, VMWare Cloud, and OpenStack, Virtualization
Containers (Docker), Microservices, PaaS (OpenShift, CloudFoundry) - In relation to Databases

Programming Skills

Ability to program in one or more of the following languages - Java, Python, node js, ruby, C/C++ using database connectors (JDBC, python, node js, ODBC)
Understanding of (and able to write) bash shell scripts
Basic understanding of git
Native Dutch speaker.

Technical Content Development Skills

Ability to author product feature blogs, create demo videos, and speak at conferences

If you are a candidate who meets the above set of qualifications, we would love to hear from you. EDB provides competitive compensation and benefits plan.

We know it takes a unique mix of people and skills to help us in our mission to supercharge Postgres, and we understand that not everyone will check every box. We’d love to hear from you and we want you to apply!

EDB is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. EDB was built on a commitment to trust and respect each other and to embrace an array of people and ideas. These values remain at the centre of our culture and are key to our company’s integrity.

min 3.5 years of experience in application design, development and implementation,
Very good knowledge of tools: npm, webpack, eslint,

Strong sense of UI aesthetics, knowledge of UX issues and experience in putting them into practice,

knowledge of at least one of the following libraries: Redux, Toolkit/Thunk, Yup, Formik, i18next, Lodash, Styled Components,

‍

Welcome

Support for the software under development,
Working with a team of developers, analysts, testers and UX designers in an agile Scrum framework,
Documenting and testing applications;

‍

What We Offer

Unique atmosphere - Good and friendly atmosphere in the company and satisfaction with cooperation with both colleagues in the department and direct superiors.
Team building events - Large, internal technology conferences, star parties and team outings.
Flexibility - Working hours are flexible and tailored to individual preferences. As is the mode of work provision: remotely or in a hybrid model.
Development paths - They are clear, straightforward and certainly not bumpy. You can choose a managerial or expert development path.
Certifications - We facilitate the development of desired competencies and subsidize training and courses.
Security - We have many years of experience in the market and have implemented national and international projects. We skillfully manage tasks and enable smooth allocation between projects.
Knowledge sharing - For those who want to grow, we have internal technology meetings and proprietary training programs. You can learn from the best, and share your knowledge and experience at company and industry technology conferences.

Multisport - Swimming pool, gym, dancing, yoga, martial arts. And all this with the card in the PLUS version. Ideal solution for sports fans and amateurs of active leisure.
English - For those who speak fluently and want to maintain this level or wish to develop their language skills, we enable free participation in English classes. Lessons are conducted in a modern and safe form of online meetings. Just learn IT!

job_title: Enterprise Sales Development Representative, Europe (Remote) - German and English Speaker
description:
About the job
About Andela

Andela exists to connect brilliance and opportunity. Since 2014, we have been dedicated to breaking down global barriers and accelerating the future of work for both technologists and organizations around the world.

For technologists, Andela offers competitive long term career opportunities with leading organizations, access to a global community of professionals, and education opportunities with leading technology providers.

For companies, Andela provides access to a global network of fully integrated team members that unlock their business’ innovation and growth potential.

At Andela, we are deeply passionate about creating long-lasting and transformative growth opportunities for all and doing it in an E.P.I.C. [andela.com/careers] way.

We are excited to continue building our remote first team with incredible people like you!

The Role

The Sales Development Representative role will be responsible for identifying and creating new qualified opportunities within the Enterprise level accounts for Andela, within our DACH region. The ideal candidate will have knowledge or experience building and executing outbound campaigns to multiple stakeholders within their targeted account list or territory. A strong ability to cultivate value-driven conversations with multiple stakeholders across complex cross-functional teams is required. If you love digital transformation and working with some of the most admired global organisations and brands, this is a wonderful opportunity!

Daily Responsibilities

Producing, delivering, and iterating prospecting strategies with email, social media, cold calling, and qualification conversations
Creating, scheduling, and managing attendance of qualified meetings for the Head of Sales
Responsible for appropriate follow-up, qualification and responsiveness to inbound inquiries for the Enterprise
Achieving and exceeding weekly/monthly/and quarterly targets (new enterprise opportunities generated, discovery calls, attributions to revenue closed won)
Partnering with Enterprise Sales Executives to identify new opportunities within targeted accounts
Building and managing comprehensive stakeholder maps by function and influence
Assisting and supporting Andela’s marketing campaigns
Actively participating and contributing to Enterprise Sales Team-related standups and meetings

Qualifications

Experience at excelling in the SDR role, proven track record of producing qualified opportunities for Sales Executives you support on a regular basis
4+ years of work experience - can include internships during school
Experience interacting with Enterprise level clients
Strong and fluent written and verbal communication skills in English and in German
Strong organisational and prioritisation skills, while managing multiple stakeholders and sales activities
Coordinate and execute prospecting strategies and actions with assigned Account Executives
Experience working and mastering a premium sales stack: Salesforce, SalesLoft, ZoomInfo, LinkedIn Sales Navigator and more...
You have a strong desire to WIN and get to the “Yes” in every account you touch
Constantly looking for creative ways to improve sales outcomes and processes you engage with on a daily basis
Live Andela’s EPIC Values… professionalism and integrity are a must!

This role is fully remote!

Benefits

Fully Remote work culture - we hire globally and all of our roles are fully remote!
Bring your own device stipend - buy your own laptop with funds from Andela
Quarterly work from home stipends
Flexible working hours
Equity (as a part of compensation package)
Healthcare, 401k (US only)
Andela Affinity Groups
Growth & development paths
Generous Paid Time Off, Parental Leave, Compassionate Leave
And more to come! We're on a journey to reimagine global benefits at Andela

At Andela, we outcompete through diversity. We know that our strengths lie in the multiplicity of talents, perspectives, backgrounds & orientations resident in our community and we take pride in that. Andela is committed to a work environment in which all individuals are treated with respect and dignity. Each individual has the right to work in a professional atmosphere that promotes equal employment opportunities and prohibits discriminatory practices. Andela provides equal employment opportunities and workplace to all employees and applicants without regard to factors including but not limited to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, pregnancy (including breastfeeding), genetic information, HIV/AIDS or any other medical status, family or parental status, marital status, amnesty or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. This commitment applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including but not limited to hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. Our policies expressly prohibit any form of harassment and/or discrimination as stated above.

Andela is home for all, come as you are.

About the job
LivePerson (NASDAQ:LPSN) is a leading customer engagement company, creating digital experiences powered by Curiously Human AI. Every person is unique, and our technology makes it possible for companies, including leading brands like HSBC, Orange, and GM Financial, to treat their audiences that way at scale. Nearly a billion conversational interactions are powered by our Conversational Cloud each month.

You'll be successful at LivePerson if you are excited to build something from the ground up. You excel by finding daily opportunities to grow at the same pace as the technology we're building, and you build partnerships that improve our business. Likewise, you're someone who sees feedback as a chance to learn and grow and believe decisions powered by data are the norm. You care about the wellbeing of others and yourself.

Overview

We are part of the Unified Messaging Service (UMS) team. UMS is the main backend messaging platform for LivePerson. It manages asynchronous messaging, but is also involved with auto-messaging, shift schedule management, file upload URL requests, and more. As part of this team, we support three application named Controller Bot, Media Handler, and a messaging SDK. Controller bots handle automated messaging for UMS clients. These bots are programmed and directly managed by the clients themselves, but the ownership related to ensuring their functionality is encapsulated here. Media Handler uploads and downloads of files via UMS. And Messaging SDK is a Node.js pass-through layer for internal and external developers to call UMS APIs.

You Will
Produce and inspire high-quality, well-tested code that is easy to read and maintain. Use technical knowledge to build new features, maintain the platform's stability at LivePerson's scale
Use the latest technologies for our customers on a massive scale
Focus on production readiness including root cause analysis, testing, monitoring, and documentation
Contribute to the team's on-call rotation to improve incident coverage
Work with 1-2 teams and work on important functionalities
Design small to mid-level applications and coordinate with other engineers on the team to build scalable solutions
Attend scrum ceremonies such as sprint grooming, sprint planning, and retrospective, and showcase technical solutions to the team
You Have
Must have at least 1 years of experience on Node.JS
Experience or working knowledge with Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Java, AWS and JavaScript
Benefits
Health: medical, dental, and vision
Time away: 28 vacation days
Development: Native AI learning
Additional: Food Vouchers, monthly phone and internet allowance.
Why You'll Love Working Here

Your entrepreneurial spirit will be supported. We love team members who chase down their big ideas, become experts, help colleagues, and own their work. These four company values guide our continued, holistic growth as individuals, as teams, and as a global organization. And to further make our point, let's just say we're very proud to be on Fast Company's list of Most Innovative Companies and Newsweek's list of most-loved workplaces.

Belonging At LivePerson

At LivePerson, people from diverse backgrounds come together to make an impact and be their authentic selves. One way we share and connect is through our employee resource groups such as: Live In Color, LP Proud, and Women In Tech. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state, and local law.

We are committed to the accessibility needs of applicants and employees. We provide reasonable accommodations to job applicants with physical or mental disabilities. Applicants with a disability who require a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or hiring process should inform their recruiting contact upon initial connection.

About the job
We are looking for a Data Engineer responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the infrastructure and systems that enable the collection, storage, and analysis of large sets of data. This can include tasks such as creating and optimizing data pipelines, designing and implementing data storage solutions, and ensuring data quality and security. Will often work closely with Data Scientists and other stakeholders to understand their data needs and design solutions that meet those needs. Strong technical skills, particularly in programming and database management, are typically required for this role.

Data Engineer mandatory skills and experience
Some essential skills and experience for a Data Engineer include:

Strong programming skills, particularly in languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.

Experience with big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, or Apache Kafka.

Proficiency in SQL and experience with database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle.

Familiarity with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.

Understanding of data warehousing concepts and data modeling techniques.

Knowledge of data integration, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) processes.

Experience with data governance and data security best practices.

Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex systems.

Excellent communication skills, as Data Engineers often need to work closely with other teams and stakeholders.

Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and experience working in a collaborative, cross-functional environment.

Having experience with Machine Learning or Data Science is a plus but not mandatory for the role of Data Engineer.
